SqlConfiguration.GetUserLoginByLoginProviderAndProviderKe: SELECT TOP 1 %USERFILTER% FROM %SCHEMA%.%USERTABLE%, %SCHEMA%.%USERLOGINTABLE% WHERE LoginProvider = %LOGINPROVIDER% AND ProviderKey = %PROVIDERKEY%
SqlConfiguration.GetClaimsByUserIdQuery: SELECT ClaimType, ClaimValue FROM %SCHEMA%.%TABLENAME% WHERE UserId = %ID%
SqlConfiguration.GetUserLoginInfoByIdQuery: SELECT LoginProvider, ProviderKey, Name FROM %SCHEMA%.%ROLETABLE% WHERE UserId = %ID%
SqlConfiguration.GetUsersByClaimQuery: SELECT %USERFILTER% FROM %SCHEMA%.%USERTABLE%, %SCHEMA%.%USERCLAIMTABLE% WHERE ClaimValue = %CLAIMVALUE% AND ClaimType = %CLAIMTYPE%
SqlConfiguration.IsInRoleQuery: SELECT 1 FROM FROM %SCHEMA%.%USERTABLE%, %SCHEMA%.%USERROLETABLE%, %SCHEMA%.%ROLETABLE% WHERE %SCHEMA%.%ROLETABLE%.Name = %ROLENAME% AND %SCHEMA%.%USERTABLE%.Id = %USERID% AND %SCHEMA%.%USERROLETABLE%.RoleId = %SCHEMA%.%ROLETABLE%.Id AND %SCHEMA%.%USERROLETABLE%.UserId = %SCHEMA%.%USERTABLE%.Id
